long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This helps the user to download all certificate course included in a learning path on a linkedin Course.
 There is no such feature in linkedin, and in my university, they require the merged pdf of all the certificates and user have to do that manually by downloading each certificates and some time the no. of certificates reach 30, hence makes things very combersome by taking 30 minutes. 
But by using this extension same job can be done in 10 seconds.

Why Choose LCD?
- Saves Times
- No manual merging required

Join the Telegram Group for support - https://t.me/+GUMfylJS7GthYTRl

Features to come:
- Including Course Completion Certificate Screenshot
- Better error handling
- Live Status of Current Course or Learning Path.
- Injecting UI to Learning Path
